title: HITACHI AIR CONDITIONING'S LATEST CUTTING-EDGE HVAC SOLUTIONS UNVEILED FOR AUSTRALIA AND NEW ZEALAND
summary: Johnson Controls-Hitachi Air Conditioning introduces new HVAC solutions that prioritize energy efficiency and reduced emissions, unveiled at ARBS 2024 in Australia. The lineup includes the Hitachi air365 Max Pro, SideSmart™, airCore 700, airHome 400, and airHome 600 series, each offering advanced features for enhanced comfort and sustainability.

title: 2024 Lighting and Landscape Trends
summary: 1. Hardscaping trends include bringing the outdoors in, using porcelain pavers, incorporating natural biophilic earth tones, using sustainable materials, using cool-toned, textured pavers, and creating "nontraditional" landscapes. 2. Lighting trends include using app-controlled lighting, LED technology, and nontraditional lighting such as wash lights and mini lights. 3. Both hardscaping and lighting trends are moving towards sustainability and energy efficiency.
green_innovation: TRUE, because it describes innovations that reduce negative environmental externalities of human activity, such as the use of sustainable materials and energy-efficient lighting.
business_innovation: TRUE, because it describes new or improved products and processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous offerings, such as app-controlled lighting and porcelain pavers.
green_product: TRUE, because it describes products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as composite decking and LED lighting.
green_process: TRUE, because it describes methods or techniques in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability, such as using recycled materials in composite decking and using energy-efficient LED lighting.

title: Flat Glass Coatings Market to reach USD 11.5 Billion by 2032, Says Global Market Insights inc.
summary: The flat glass coatings market is projected to be worth over USD 11.5 billion by 2032. Advanced coatings for sheet glass offer superior UV protection, improved energy efficiency, and scratch resistance, making them attractive for green building and automotive design. Epoxy resin coatings are gaining popularity due to their exceptional adhesive properties, durability, and versatility.
green_innovation: TRUE; Flat glass coatings improve environmental sustainability goals by reducing energy consumption in buildings and vehicles, reducing the need for harsh chemicals in production, and protecting building occupants from harmful UV rays.
business_innovation: TRUE; Advanced flat glass coatings are new or improved products that differ significantly from previous coatings in terms of their performance and durability.
green_product: TRUE; Advanced flat glass coatings are designed to reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycle, from manufacturing to disposal.
green_process: TRUE; Advanced flat glass coatings employ sustainable production processes that minimize energy consumption and waste, and often use renewable resources and recycled materials.
likely_naics_codes: ['327213 Glass Product Manufacturing', '332311 Aluminum Sheet, Plate, and Foil Manufacturing', '325110 Stone, Clay, Glass, and Concrete Products Manufacturing', '327991 Cut Stone and Stone Products Manufacturing']
greenwashing: FALSE; The article does not provide any evidence that the advanced flat glass coatings described are an example of greenwashing.

title: Celebrating 40 Years of Unparalleled Partnership: Goscor Lift Trucks and Crown Equipment
summary: Goscor Lift Trucks (GLT) has been the sole distributor of Crown forklifts in Southern Africa for 40 years. Crown is renowned for the durability and reliability of its products, which are designed to withstand demanding environments and minimize downtime. GLT's superior aftermarket support ensures that Crown equipment remains operational and efficient throughout its lifecycle.
